Text: WOOT! Small file size, yes! I hope everyone start doing this. Sometimes I just delete these after watching them. I don't need to download a big file.
Just watch it online or on basic cable if you're just going to delete them after you dunce. Not even a paid channel show lol. I just stream shit when I'm not keeping them.. maybe you should too.
